participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, Emily enjoys helping others and finds joy in her teaching profession.
participant_1.background: I'm a woman. I work as a school teacher. I attend church every week. I enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. I have dogs.

participant_2.name: David Thompson
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about music, David loves sharing his talent with others and giving back to the community.
participant_2.background: My father played violin professionally. I'm a piano teacher on the side. I enjoy exploring new parts of the city. I volunteer at the homeless shelter.
